subject: Self Care
title: Reconnecting With Purpose
description: A fast breakdown of Reconnecting With Purpose for builders.

hook.text: Before burnout, she knew exactly why she worked. After, she couldn't remember. The purpose got lost in the grind.

buildup.text: Burnout severs the connection between daily work and deeper meaning. Restoring that link is essential to recovery.

discovery.text: Research shows that purpose-driven work is a buffer against burnout. Meaning sustains motivation when energy fails.

twist.text: Sometimes recovery reveals the old purpose no longer fits. Burnout can be a signal to find a new direction.

climax.text: Ask yourself: what would I do if exhaustion wasn't a factor? The answer points toward your authentic purpose.

punchline.text: Burnout buries purpose. Recovery means digging it back up.

quiz.question: Why is reconnecting with purpose important for burnout recovery?
options: Meaning sustains motivation when energy alone fails
Purpose is only important at the start of a career
